body_html:
@kate-kate - The bazel commands are intended to build TensorFlow binaries (like toco) from source. So I'm confused a bit by your setup since it seems you're installing TensorFlow from pip and not building from source.

Could you elaborate on your setup?
body_text:
@kate-kate - The bazel commands are intended to build TensorFlow binaries (like toco) from source. So I'm confused a bit by your setup since it seems you're installing TensorFlow from pip and not building from source.
Could you elaborate on your setup?
body:
@kate-kate - The `bazel` commands are intended to build TensorFlow binaries (like `toco`) from source. So I'm confused a bit by your setup since it seems you're installing TensorFlow from `pip` and not building from source.

Could you elaborate on your setup?
